title: Monarch, Colombo3 Luxury Penthouse
details:
Only Meant For The Super Rich. This Beautiful 4 Bed Roomed 3800sqft Penthouse On 26th Floor Overlooking The Indian Ocean Is A Master Piece. Its Totally Tastefully Furnished By The Owner Since He Is Living In It. The Apartment comprises 4 bed rooms, with on-suite bathrooms for 2 rooms, a spectacular large hall with a large dining room, beautiful balcony overlooking the Indian ocean & beautiful wet & dry pantry.

The Apartment Is Being Given With The Furniture And Fittings
